<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Malleable Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=3804) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Reflection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=431" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 121</row>

**Prerequisites**
ability to cast at least one [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) spell

**Requirements**
You're polymorphed by a spell that has multiple choices of battle form.

</column>

---

You adroitly shift your form, taking on another appearance. Choose a different battle form of the polymorph spell affecting you, and change to that form instead of the current one. This destabilizes the spell's magic, reducing its duration by 1 round. Use the level of the spell to determine the statistics, as normal.
